name: myTunerRadio
0:
”Alexa, ask myTuner Radio to play Fox News Radio”
”Alexa, ask myTuner Radio to play National Public Radio”
”Alexa, ask myTuner Radio to play All The Best Oldies”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: mytuner radio
Developer Terms of Use
des:
myTuner Radio is all you need to listen to more than 50,000 free radio stations from more than 200 countries and territories.

Whether you have a station of choice or you’re just looking around, it’s very likely that myTuner Radio Stations has what you’re looking for. Whether you are in the Big Apple or Europe, Asia or Australia you can tune in to the best AM, FM, DAB and online radio stations of your country or of your homeland, including the local AM and FM radio stations you can’t live without.

Using the skill is uber-simple. You can ask myTuner Radio to play a station of your choice and Alexa will start playing it for you. In case several radio stations might match your request, you can fasten the playing process by telling Alexa the number that corresponds to your preferred station's position on the results Alexa's given you - e.g. "three".

Looking for a recommendation? myTuner Radio Stations can play the most popular stations for you. Just ask for it!

Been listening for a while? myTuner Radio Stations allows you to get back directly to your last played radio station when you re-open the myTuner Radio skill – only if that’s what you wish!

Try the best radio listening experience and discover music right on your Echo device. All the FM radio stations, AM radio stations, DAB radio stations and online radio stations available for free through myTuner Radio Stations.

Get instant access to live radio stations such as, among many others: Fox News Radio, Infowars, KLove Radio player, NPR News, Coast to Coast AM, WEEI, Espn Radio, 1010 WINS, WNYC, Prairie Home Companion, Hot 97, NPR Radio, WBZ, Kiro Radio 97.3, WSB Radio FM, Radio Disney... and much more to listen to on your all-in-one radiostations app.

- More information at: http://www.myTuner-radio.com
- Like us on Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/mytunerradioapp
- Follow us on Google+: https://plus.google.com/109387939105737258973
- Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/mytunerradio
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
